official_title: To amend the Truth in Savings Act to delay the effective date of certain regulations.

summary.text: Truth in Savings Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Truth in Savings Act to delay to 15 months after publication in final form (currently nine months) the effective date for specified regulations pertaining to the uniform disclosure of interest rates and fees on depository accounts.

titles.title: To amend the Truth in Savings Act to delay the effective date of certain regulations.
